ctx: intros d a la ls hd tl n H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros d a la ls hd tl n H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

original: intros d a la ls hd tl n H. unfold rec_list_terms in H. destruct n. - simpl. auto. - simpl. destruct ls. + simpl. auto. + simpl. destruct tl. * simpl in H. discriminate. * simpl in H. rewrite orb_true_iff in H. destruct H. { right. left. apply H. } { destruct H as [H1 H2]. rewrite andb_true_iff in H1. destruct H1 as [H1a H1b]. left. apply H2. }
